scripts.compile: yarn linker && printf "module.exports = {tvcInBase64: '%s', abi: require('./Hello.abi.json')};" $(cat build/Hello.tvc | base64 -w0) > build/Hello.js
scripts.linker: yarn solc && docker run --rm -it -e USER_AGREEMENT=yes -v $(pwd):/code -w /code tonlabs/compilers tvm_linker compile --lib contract/stdlib_sol.tvm --abi-json build/Hello.abi.json -o build/Hello.tvc build/Hello.code
scripts.solc: mkdir -p build && docker run --rm -it -e USER_AGREEMENT=yes -v $(pwd):/code -w /code tonlabs/compilers solc contract/Hello.sol --output-dir build
scripts.start: yarn stop && docker run -d --name ton-local -e USER_AGREEMENT=yes -p 80:80 tonlabs/local-node
